review: I love my Fire TV, I also bought a Fire Stick I can take with me. I've never used anything like this before, and I found it makes it very easy to access lots of media content, including Netflix and Amazon video. I'm very selective on my TV watching and this makes it easy to find exactly what I want to watch when I have time to watch it.
author: CV

review: We like it very much, but there are a few glitches with Sling, which we purchased as part of Amazon Fire TV. For one, when I tried to go on Sling the first day, it didn't recognize the email we used when we paid 3 months in advance, so I had to give them another email and pay another $20. Also, often when we are watching a program, it will suddenly shut down, which is annoying. The best part of Amazon Fire TV is getting rid of satellite TV programming and charges and having a larger selection of movies and TV programs.
author: Joseph P. Reynolds

review: Awesome Product.  My family has greatly enjoyed the Amazon Fire TV.  We have a couple of Chrome Cast that I kept for the workout room so I can caste from my phone, but found the Amazon Stick and Fire TV to be easier and more versatile to use.  We bought the Amazon stick for our bedroom and have the Amazon Fire TV in our living room.  We shared this with my extended family and now all of them have Amazon Fire TVs and are enjoying them immensely.
